ComicInfo.Title: "The Good, The Bad, and the Ogg-ly" (The Ogglympics: Part 2 of 3)
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Saturday Morning Adventures
ComicInfo.Summary: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have beaten Mr. Ogg’s first game, but he’s too genre-savvy to give up that easily! With two more challenges to go, there’s still enough time for him to make a comeback. The good guys may always win, but the scheming trickster from Dimension Z has found a catch: what if the Heroes in a Half-Shell aren’t the only good guys in the room? The games continue in part two of the Ogglympics!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:54:30. [CVDB1056396]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Gigi Dutreix, Ramon Rosanas, Sarah Myer
ComicInfo.Characters: Bebop, Creepy Eddie , Donatello, Krang, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Mister Ogg , Raphael, Rocksteady, Shredder
